```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tableone)
library(knitr)
# Check OS and alter file path accordingly.
os.check <- function(){
  if (.Platform$OS.type == "windows") {
    pathstart <- "//ucdenver.pvt/"
  } else {
    pathstart <- "/Volumes/"
  }
  return(pathstart)
}
pathstart <- os.check()
```
